name: OLEG
description:
Oleg - simple guy, just like you and me.  But his difficult childhood made him see the world differently.

This is a short visual novel in which you have to choose the fate of the Oleg. There are many things in the game that are not explained, in the hope that everyone will understand it in their own way.

It's my first game. Right now I am learning new game engine, and would like to find enthusiastic people, just like me.  

I really hope that you will like this game.
